question: In which nation "Odzala-Kokoua National Park" is located?
explanation: Odzala-Kokoua National Park is located in the Republic of Congo. It is also a biosphere reserve. This national park houses one of Africa's most diverse primate populations. "African Parks", a non-profit conservation organisation, is managing this national park. This national park lies in the Congo Basin which has the second-largest rainforest in the world after Amazon. It is a thriving tourist destination of the Republic of Congo.
